title: FreeHand MX - Am I the only one...?
content:
Greetings,   
   
This is my first post here.   
Please excuse my english. This is not my native language.   
   
I would just wish to know if anyone ever noticed a problem in FreeHand MX and 10 (OS X)... or is it me?   
   
In FreeHand MX and 10 (OS X):   
Type an "O" and then use the menu "Text : Convert to Paths". I see a whole bunch of segments. Way too much.   
   
Do the same in Illustrator 10 and below:   
No problems.   
   
Thank you for your input :-)   
   
Yves Malouin
author: yves_malouin
